website_summaries.verdict: Super-inexpensive cruelty-free, natural product that offers visible results.
pros: Fruit stem cells plump up fine lines
Smooths well into the skin as a cover-up, and also helps the appearance of wrinkles over time
Can reduce the appearance of deep wrinkles

customer_reviews.title: This product works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's the only deep wrinkle cream that actually makes a difference for me. The deep wrinkles around my mouth are quite a bit less noticeable. I love all the Andalou products. They are excellent .
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like this filler a lot, it's a great alternative to injections. I'm pretty skeptical of these kinds of claims, but I like to put things to the test for myself. You can see other fillers cost mega $$$ and this performs way better. I use it on my smile lines, and this plumps that area out. It's not a permanent solution, of course, it's just very good at doing what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Scrump

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This actually works. Very few products out there deliver their claim. This really does. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Alan A

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: What a change. Eliminates the dark circles plus smooths out the wrinkles under the eyes. I can see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again. I think this product works at ...
customer_reviews.text: Will purchase again. I think this product works at softening and thus reducing wrinkles, but it is not a drastic change, of course.
customer_reviews.author: skyt

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I have allergies and this is so ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! I have allergies and this is so gentle on the eye area
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than anything else I've tried for filling in wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: j trout

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me :(
customer_reviews.text: I have seen no real change in the appearance of wrinkles (the fine ones or the deeper one between my eyes). Only plus was it was not greasy and felt good on the skin. Probably would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: momofmen

customer_reviews.title: Great multitasker, but not a line filler
customer_reviews.text: This product it best used as a primer or over makeup. It will not fill in lines, (only legit filler, Botox, and a facelift will help there,) but it does blur the look pores and lines a bit. It doesn’t irritate my very sensitive skin. Tips: 1. Wait until all skincare or makeup has dried downbefore applying. 2. Gently pat it into skin; don’t rub. 2. Use to smooth makeup creasing 3. DIY a BB cream dation by mixing 25% foundation 75% line filler. 4. Turn loose powder formulas into sheer cream like formulas for a fast natural look 5. smooths flyaway hair or brows Bottom line: Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: love this. i mainly got this to help out with my dark circles and it's working. i notice a difference from nights i don't wear it to nights i do. my eyes look fresher when i use it. it goes on smoothly, absorbs quickly, smells great, and feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn's Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Did not do anything except maybe moisturize the areas a little. But saw no difference in the wrinkles. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Actually pretty excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin, 30s, work outdoors and am beginning to get fine lines and wrinkles because I am human, but society has influenced my judgement and I felt the need to purchase a product to enhance my beauty and its honestly effective. It is just slightly plumping, not in a weird artificial way. It just made my lines less noticeable after a week of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Got a rash wherever applied on face
customer_reviews.text: Could not use long enough to see results. A very itchy rash occurred on my brow furrow which thickened the skin as well. The crows feet areas had reactions that looked like a combo of burns & like I was struck by something. I must note that I do get reactions from MI. I thought I did my homework on the product. Oh well. My non allergen friend can probably use it —as there is no refund available.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: This is not a denial filler cream
customer_reviews.text: More like a regular cream. It did not blur any fine lines and not even within time of using it. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ydalyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Lessons the look of wrinkles...they aren't as deep.
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love this product and continue to purchase it regularly along with many other Andalou products. It is great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and effective
customer_reviews.text: My skin absorbs this quickly and is moisturized. Lines are a little less visible. I only use this in the morning but it might work better if I used it at night, as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The product doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: The product made Now improvement in my skin. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Harlean Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: So far I do not see any change
customer_reviews.text: It may be too soon to tell, so far I do not see anything different. If this product appears to diminish wrinkles, I will redo the review.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I used this for fine line and wrinkles. No result
customer_reviews.author: Lois Rezvani

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for awhile, and it does nothing for my wrinkles around my mouth or crows feet. I am 67 years old
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I love the Andalou products but this didn’t make a difference to me at all. I used until all of it was gone and around my eyes look the same. It does moisturize very well though.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it says
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave bad reviews but since I can't return this I thought I should let others know before buying that it really isn't worth it. I love andalou products and use many of them for a very long time but this one to me just doesn't do what it says it will. Wish I would of read other reviews and saved my money :(
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: Been using 2x daily for month haven’t seen any results yet Tried because of ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product! I think it did help avoid deep wrinkles. I have been using it for a year and it helps a lot!
customer_reviews.author: C.R.U

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not see a change in the look of my skin
customer_reviews.author: Diana P.

customer_reviews.title: It does not help with any wrinkles, fine or deep. Not greasy.
customer_reviews.text: It was very smooth & not greasy. It does nothing for any wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: dbf

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when i saw no results after hearing good reviews. Oh well maybe it’s my skin I don’t know but did nothing for my skin. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: This has truly worked for me! It has visibly minimized my wrinkles 😊🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Rhondakan

customer_reviews.title: No change at all
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes because their shampoo for hair loss is amazing. Their wrinkle cream made no difference whatsoever for me. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply. Not a huge change ... looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: gssusie1

customer_reviews.title: Product scam
customer_reviews.text: Does not help with wrinkles at all. Good face moisturizer though, not too oily.
customer_reviews.author: kris garcia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fill Anything But Seller's Coffer
customer_reviews.text: I assumed, based on the product's name, that it filled in wrinkles. That would have been nice. I should have just set fire to $20. The effect would have been the same. (Basically the same review for all their products - snake oil that smells lovely.)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Andalou products they are fantastic and I would totally recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work that great
customer_reviews.text: I needed it to fill in lines around my mouth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased several times--wish it would come in a larger tube!
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina Pedraza

customer_reviews.title: The product from the tube was very liquid and runny much like water at the time I opened it
customer_reviews.text: The box was not sealed. The product from the tube was very liquid and runny much like water at the time I opened it. After squeezing out a much amount of its, the rest of the product is not runny anymore. I requested a refund, but they did not approve it because of opened package; however, at the time I got it, it was not sealed and just like an old product which might be used before. I have been using it a few times, no differences about improving my wrinkles yet.
customer_reviews.author: T&T

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used up and really didn't notice a great difference. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Deep wrinkle filler
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This cream really smooths out wrinkles. I noticed an improvement within two weeks. It also improves skin radiance.
customer_reviews.author: linda p

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I could see a big difference around ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I could see a big difference around my mouth and under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I read up on this product and company. If you like natural, this is really lovely and it works! I am a life time customer of this product line now!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lynne

customer_reviews.title: andalou product
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and is relatively inexpensive. This is the third time I've purchased it. Good service and great product.I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed in the results
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would do a better job "filling" than it does. I used Garnier and Loreal before and they work better. It is too fluidy for filling. Needs to be more like "spackle" for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: andalou products
customer_reviews.text: Not the best product but good. Obviously doesn't fill deep wrinkles so rather a misnomer. If you want truth, ask for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It should be called "Wrinkle" not "Deep Wrinkle", it's not a miracle cream...
customer_reviews.text: Botox need not worry about this cream encroaching on it's market. I do appreciate the fact that it softens my lines and isn't too heavy. I'll stick with it because botulism seems a bit extreme to me for vanity's sake, but to each their own.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday cream for the eyes and lips.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this cream for me the first time and I soon added it to my usual routine. It is not too hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: darlene hines

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: I generally look for this product at all makeup counters. I decided to take a look at its availability on the internet and lo I found a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: William R Brown

customer_reviews.title: I continue to buy and use this product.  Very affordable.
customer_reviews.text: This product works relatively fast to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, I'd say, within an hour. I use it on the lines above my upper lip when applying morning moistureizer and it shrinks the lines. Very noticeable difference. I sometimes apply it in late afternoon when heading to an evening event.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Andalou products!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love all Andalou products. I have super sensitive skin and I found out about Amndalou at local Sprouts. They are always ranked super low on .e.w.g website. Their products don't make my skin itchy. This one has great non sticky texture, smells light, and feels good on the skin. Most importantly, it doesn't irritate.
customer_reviews.author: JMK_JMK

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING !
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about buying this. I read some of the other reviews and decided to give it a try. I am VERY pleased with how well it works. I used it on my "kissy wrinkles" around my lips and I could hardly believe the results! It really does work! I would recommend using it under your make up, and then using either a light make up or an airbrush method. My results lasted all day. I like the way it seems to hydrate my skin, as well as filling in the lines around my mouth. I also used it on the furrows between my eyes with great results. I will absolutely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah&Mike

customer_reviews.title: If you need actual hydration SKIP THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be a richly hydrating cream. It is not. It absorbs too quickly and quite frankly left me very disappointed. Hydration didnt last at all!!! There is hardly any oil/emollient properties and appears to be loaded with silicone due to its matte/cloudy texture. More like a quick drying gel-cream.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it was.  It's not a filler.
customer_reviews.text: I was confused by the reviews, tried to figure out if this product is actually a filler or something purporting to erase wrinkles. I used the Honey app to follow the price and bought it when a alert came up with a low price. So, mystery solved. It's not a filler (something that is essentially Spackle for the face). I had checked EWG.org to see if it had unhealthy chemicals. It does not, it's basically benign. I'll use it and if it actually improves wrinkles (not holding my breath), I will update this review. I still need a Spackle compound to go under make up but don't want to use something that pours carcinogens through my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Glass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 40 year old skin
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this, as it seems like it wouldn't do anything. I'm so glad I listened to the rave reviews here. I just recieved this yesterday and put it on before bed, and before my new andalou night cream. Just as others have said, it is non-greasy, creamy, and absorbs quickly. My skin feels so nice to the touch. I have very sensitive skin and am always worried when trying a new product, but no issues with this one. It pats on nicely and makes my skin feel silky. It almost feels like a very light balm.
customer_reviews.author: IthacaRed

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Every night before bed, I put this cream on my forehead and around my eyes. Before I started using this product, I had a very faint line on my forehead. Within a short time of using this product, I noticed that line disappearing. I'm now on my second tube. This is a mainstay in my nightly skincare routine! (I'm 30 by the way)
customer_reviews.author: Nichole LouiseTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product daily for about a year now and keep re-purchasing because it works very well, contains ingredients I trust, and is affordable. I tend to have dry skin and sometimes need a little something extra BUT as a daily facial moisturizer, this is my go-to! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other similar deep wrinkle fillers
customer_reviews.text: This product works better to fill deep wrinkles than others I have tried. I will definitely reorder when the tube is empty.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the reviews say it is
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I purchased to help smooth out wrinkles, and it does not work. some of the wrinkles I have are a little better, but this is a product for someone in their 20's who thinks they have wrinkles but does not really have any. I am in my 40's and the wrinkles are just beginning to show up and this product does nothing for them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what this is actually supposed to do....
customer_reviews.text: It says it's a filler....but it doesn't actually fill much. I've tried it under lotion (as recommended), over lotion, and both under and over, and...maybe a bit of a filler if you do both, but it doesn't last long. I wouldn't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this eye serum! I have VERY sensitive eyes and have to be extremely careful of what eye creams I use. To my astonishment with this cream I didn't even shed one tear or have any irritation what so ever after using it. I couldn't be happier. I also bought the Luminous Vit C eye serum to compare, and it's great as well. This one is a little thicker, which I like. but both have their advantages and I'll use both of them. I'm sold on this company and will gladly try any other eye creams they offer. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel younger.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I know i still have wrinkles but this stuff helps minimize them and just makes my skin feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith Huff-Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Wunderlift for about two years and it reliably hides the bags and wrinkles around my eyes. This product did nothing. Would not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: LabMom

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I only used it on the parts of my face that my hair did not cover. Within a week there was a marked difference in the deep creases on either side of my eyes. I'm thrilled. Re-ordering now.
customer_reviews.author: TPruitt

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I got brave and ventured away from my usual cream, for me that was a mistake. Its creamy and goes on easily, but I just didn't see the results I was hoping for, so it's back to my usual stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Leah J. McAllister

customer_reviews.title: I just wasn't impressed with this like I was other products in this line
customer_reviews.text: I don't know, I just wasn't impressed with this like I was other products in this line. Will I order it again? Maybe. Will I recommend it? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: MariEV

customer_reviews.title: Great cream!
customer_reviews.text: Andalou Naturals really do work! My face & wrinkles looked better on my forehead & crows feet shortly after I applied it!
customer_reviews.author: Gary S. Rotella

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I see no difference using or not. It does feel good in my face.
customer_reviews.author: T bird

customer_reviews.title: My face did not like it
customer_reviews.text: Something in this made my skin itchy and flaky. I love most of their products so I'm not sure what happened with this one.
customer_reviews.author: ToddlerMom

customer_reviews.title: 30 something
customer_reviews.text: in my late 30s worked really well on my purple bags under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Rotondo

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this
customer_reviews.text: Honestly don’t see a difference. How long does it take to work ?!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Andalou Naturals Deep Wrinkle Dermal Filler
customer_reviews.text: I've used two tubes and no results. Waste of $30.00
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this products. It works just as well as a brand that costs 5 times more.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it and so far I like it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa brooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It performed far better than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this immediately because of the smell. Most products from this company smell great. This has an old lady perfume smell.
customer_reviews.author: EJ P.

customer_reviews.title: andalou deep wrinkle cermal filler
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product but it did not work for me. I used it for three weeks and did not notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Stohon

customer_reviews.title: So far I like this product
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product, not greasy, non pore clogging, no fragrance. Still need a few weeks to see if my wrinkles disappear
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mcgonigle

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: even after 4 weeks there was no improvement visible. Waste of money/
customer_reviews.author: Ruth R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without this product. It feels great, smells great and yes it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Baker

customer_reviews.title: Don't see much difference after using.
customer_reviews.text: I really don't see much difference in my wrinkles after using this product. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MERI

customer_reviews.title: this works better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this works better than nothing, and is definitely different than a moisturizer. It truly is more if a "filler". It's obviously not going to erase your lines and wrinkles (why do you think the skincare industry is so competitive), but it certainly hydrates and is made of all natural ingredients, unlike most department store stuff with chemicals (silicones and phalates, etc).
customer_reviews.author: My Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: I definitely notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a month and notice a difference in my 11 o'clock lines between the eyes on forehead. The prices on amazon can't be beat either.
customer_reviews.author: bwirks

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: only used once didn't see much difference we will see after a few times
customer_reviews.author: connie Stambaugh

product_meta.title: Andalou Naturals Deep Wrinkle Dermal Filler, 0.6 Ounces
product_meta.description:
Deep Wrinkle Dermal FillerProduct DescriptionFruit stem cell complex, resveratrol CoQ10 and goji glycopeptides boost cell energy for dermal vitality, supporting essential building blocks, collagen and elastin, as capuacu butter reduces skin tension to visibly plump and smooth fine lines and wrinklesProduct DescriptionAge Defying Skin CareSolutions for Dry/Very Dry SkinDull & FlakyPremature AgingFine Lines & Wrinkles
Directions AM & PM. Apply to clean skin directly on fine lines and wrinkles around eyes, mouth, cheeks, and forehead. Follow with moisturizer.
Other Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Vegetable Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter*, Glyceryl Stearate, Allantoin, Fruit Stem Cells (Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive 8 Berry Complex*, Firming Complex Hydrolyzed Myrtus Communis (Myrtle) Leaf Extract, Resveratrol, Ubiquinone (CoQ10), Lycium Barbarum (Goji) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuacu) Seed Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Extract*, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Vanilla Isolates *Certified Organic Ingredients Fair Trade Ingredients
Warnings: Keep out of reach of children. As with all dietary supplements, consult your healthcare professional before use. See product label for more information.
feature_bullets: RESTORE VITALITY: Formulated with fruit stem cell complex, resveratrol CoQ10 & goji glycopeptides, this moisturizer helps support the skin's building blocks while also plumping & smoothing fine lines & wrinkles.

AGE DEFYING, NATURE INSPIRED: Andalou Naturals Age Defying skincare products help hydrate dry skin & fight fine lines & wrinkles with restorative antioxidants. Use as directed to support a youthful look.
INGREDIENTS FROM NATURE: We support Superior Source Ingredient Standards & only use ingredients that are organic, non-GMO, gluten free, sustainable, fair trade, cruelty free, & nature-derived.

FRUIT STEM CELL SCIENCE: Every Andalou Natural's product—including masks, creams, serums, moisturizers, cleansers, & toners—use nature's antioxidant defense solution to protect & support healthy skin & hair.

ANDALOU NATURALS: We are the first Non-GMO Project Verified beauty brand & our commitment to uplifting people & the planet is reflected in our hair products, cleansers, lotions, serums, face masks & more!
